ComicInfo.Title: The Prisoners of the Black Pyramid!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Prisoners of the Black Pyramid!: Thor, the Black Knight, Hogun and the Earth-Force battle thru Seth's Black Pyramid where they free Bes and then discover that Odin is being held captive by Seth. On Asgard the forces of Seth are overwhelming the Asgardian gods but the Celtic Gods of Avalon arrive to assist Asgard against Seth.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:33:56. [Issue ID 45393]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Bes (God of Luck),Grog the God Crusher,Valdor,Earth-Force [Earth-Lord,Horus,Seth (villain),Grand Vizier,Wind-Warrior [Pamela Shaw]],Skyhawk
